Citation

Source: inst/CITATION

Sebastian Kreutzer, Christoph Burow, Michael Dietze, Margret C. Fuchs, Christoph Schmidt, Manfred Fischer and Johannes Friedrich (2020). Luminescence: Comprehensive Luminescence Dating Data Analysis. R package version 0.9.7. https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=Luminescence
